step_feedback.feedback: Good job finding a comfortable position. Try to keep your shoulders relaxed.
Your hands are well-placed on your abdomen. Focus on a gentle, steady placement.
You're doing great inhaling through your nose and tightening your body. Keep that visualization going!
Excellent exhale and muscle relaxation. Remember to visualize pushing fluid out as you relax.
Second round is looking good! Maintain that comfortable posture and relaxed shoulders.
Hands are still in a great position on your abdomen. Keep the pressure light and even.
Nice work inhaling through your nose and engaging your muscles. Keep visualizing the fluid movement.
Fantastic exhale and relaxation. You're effectively completing the exercise cycle.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. Keep practicing this to help your lymphatic system.
